Source.Name: module-pae-gspca
Source.Description: Contains driver for more than 200 webcams from manufacturers like Creative, Logitech, Mustek, etc., using chips like Conexant, Etoms, Mars-Semi, Pixart, Sonix, Sunplus, Transvision, Vimicro, Microdia.

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to e71d8236f603 ov534_9: Propagate USB errors to higher level main: Clear any previous USB error when starting the transfer. pac7311: Use usb_err to propagate USB errors. pac7302: Use usb_err to propagate USB errors. pac7302/pac7311: Remove the unused page loading. zc3xx: Change the resolutions of some sensors. sonixj: Fix bad video mode for all webcams.
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 1496806932f0 Enable Benq driver pac7302: Fix a random USB error sunplus: Fix bridge exchanges Check the interface class at probe time. zc3xx: Adjust the pas202b exchanges. zc3xx: Fix the contrast control. sonixj: Add more controls. vc032x: Change the sensor of 046d:0892 and 046d:0896.
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 4a80605644fe of gspca Clear the urb status before resubmit Add the sensor po1030, GL860, PAC7302, STV0680
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Dummy update for easier merging
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add support for ovfx2 bridge Add support for OV2610 and OV3610 sensors zc3xx.c: Change init sequences of sensor tas5130c stv06xx + ov518: dont discard every other frame Enable GSPCA_JEILINJ Enable GSPCA_SN9C20X
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make ov7660 sensor work again

Update.Comment: Bump to stable, added Genius ge110 Philips spc220nc pac207 and fix mjpeg palette for vc cams
